name: Ninety Days
description:
You are the king who are trying to overthrow, and all that remains in his estate is a tower fortified with various weapons. All the king needs is to hold out for 90 days and contain the onslaught of the disaffected.

Ninety Days is a Tower Defense game where the player defends his tower, improving it from the amount of gold coins earned, building defense and attack upgrades to hold back waves of enemies, archers, swordsmen, giants, catapults and evil ravens for 90 days.

Game features:
- Complexity
- Purchase of improvements
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
